field.name: coord_type
field.comment: Projected or unprojected coordinates - projected coordinates (e.g. UTM) may be treated as cartesian by some modules.

field.name: coord_units
field.comment: If the coord_type is LATLONG, indicate the unit of angular measure: Degree|Grad|Radian; If the coord_type is Projected, indicate unit of distance measure: Foot|Meter.

field.name: coord_ogc_wkt_string
field.comment: Coordinate sys description in Open GIS Consortium WKT (well known text) format - see http://www.opengeospatial.org/docs/01-009.pdf; this is provided for the convenience of the user or third party modules.
